name: Galactic Protector
description:
Description:

The galaxy is under attack by a mysterious evil army. Only you can stop them!

Instructions:

Use arrow keys to move.

Hold F button to fire projectiles (uses energy).

Press A button to fire salvo of projectiles around yourself (uses energy).

Hold SHIFT button to move faster (uses fuel).

Press W button to make yourself invulnerable to damage for a short time (has 15 seconds cool-down).

Each time you reach a new level, your progress is saved and you can select that level from Select Level option from main menu.
